testcase.name: Command Palette › should open command palette with F1
Command Palette › should execute command via command palette
Command Palette › should support command palette with Ctrl+Shift+P
Context Menu › should execute editor context menu command
Context Menu › should execute explorer context menu command
File Operations › should create file with contents
File Operations › should switch between multiple files
File Operations › should edit open file
File Operations › should show dirty indicator when file has unsaved changes
Helper Functions › waitForVSCodeWorkbench should wait for workbench to load
Helper Functions › closeWelcomeTabs should close welcome tabs
Helper Functions › waitForWorkspaceReady should wait for workspace to be ready
Output Channel › should open output panel
Output Channel › should select output channel
Output Channel › should wait for output text
Output Channel › should check if output contains text
Output Channel › should clear output channel
Settings › should open settings UI
